channel.title: Need help with my 508! Please D:
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've looked everywhere on the forums, on google, etc. But I can't find anything.
So, I need your help
On a 508 bulby source, what folder, and text file do I need to edit for my NPC dialog? By that I mean, what it yells out. This is my first 508 server, so please go easy :3
[size=36pt]Thanks! <3[/size]

item.title: Need help with my 508! Please D:
item.dc:creator: @slogieftw slogieftw
item.description:
@slogieftw wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:7, topic:387003”][quote author=slogieftw link=topic=482799.msg3535728#msg3535728 date=1300554318]

It’s in NPCOption1.java

Looks a bit like this:

if(pnp.npcType == NPC ID)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 242);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, FaceAnimation ID, 242, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, NPC ID, 242, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “NPC Name”, 242, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “First line o’ text”, 242, 4);
p.frames.setString(p, “Second line o’ text”, 242, 5);
}

Ahah! Thanks ;D!
You helped me big time(:

Another problem, I don’t know where to find that .txt file ;o
[/quote]
Servername\Bulby\io\packets\NPCOption1.[/quote]

Yeah, I found it before you posted
But thanks for your help (:

Read full topic
